adm:managed-object.name: root-dn
adm:managed-object.adm:synopsis:
The
configuration contains all the Root DN Users defined in the directory server. In addition, it also defines the default set of privileges that Root DN Users automatically inherit.

adm:property.name: default-root-privilege-name
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the names of the privileges that root users will be granted by default.

adm:value.name: bypass-lockdown
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Allows the associated user to bypass server lockdown mode.

adm:value.name: bypass-acl
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Allows the associated user to bypass access control checks performed by the server.

adm:value.name: modify-acl
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Allows the associated user to modify the server's access control configuration.

adm:value.name: config-read
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Allows the associated user to read the server configuration.

adm:value.name: config-write
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Allows the associated user to update the server configuration. The config-read privilege is also required.

adm:value.name: jmx-read
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Allows the associated user to perform JMX read operations.

adm:value.name: jmx-write
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Allows the associated user to perform JMX write operations.

adm:value.name: jmx-notify
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Allows the associated user to subscribe to receive JMX notifications.

adm:value.name: ldif-import
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Allows the user to request that the server process LDIF import tasks.

adm:value.name: ldif-export
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Allows the user to request that the server process LDIF export tasks.

adm:value.name: backend-backup
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Allows the user to request that the server process backup tasks.

adm:value.name: backend-restore
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Allows the user to request that the server process restore tasks.

adm:value.name: server-lockdown
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Allows the user to place and bring the server of lockdown mode.

adm:value.name: server-shutdown
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Allows the user to request that the server shut down.

adm:value.name: server-restart
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Allows the user to request that the server perform an in-core restart.

adm:value.name: proxied-auth
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Allows the user to use the proxied authorization control, or to perform a bind that specifies an alternate authorization identity.

adm:value.name: disconnect-client
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Allows the user to terminate other client connections.

adm:value.name: cancel-request
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Allows the user to cancel operations in progress on other client connections.

adm:value.name: password-reset
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Allows the user to reset user passwords.

adm:value.name: data-sync
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Allows the user to participate in data synchronization.

adm:value.name: update-schema
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Allows the user to make changes to the server schema.

adm:value.name: privilege-change
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Allows the user to make changes to the set of defined root privileges, as well as to grant and revoke privileges for users.

adm:value.name: unindexed-search
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Allows the user to request that the server process a search that cannot be optimized using server indexes.

adm:value.name: subentry-write
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Allows the associated user to perform LDAP subentry write operations.
